messages.message: @Vasu you need to change the template in fit and then run the makefile target in the same directory. Updating manually is fine too. Just make sure you check changes into git.

So, they are already checked in to git as part of the above PR and applied manually for now. A follow up - What directory exactly does the makefile target live in? I checked the dir (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/tree/master/third-party/crafting/templates) where the template lives in and there doesn't seem to be a makefile :thinking_face:
I apologize -- it seems I never checked in the Makefile. It's on one of the patch commits on my local branch. I'll push it now!
